@lothy wrote:

I had trouble understanding that. =\ But you’re not trying to change the client are you? Because you mentioned HybridScape… that just comes with the MoparScape client for people to muck around with. You can’t add NPCs to it without it unless you go to where its source is stored…
If that isn’t what you meant, then I can’t really help you.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Poseidus Poseidus
item.description:
@Poseidus wrote:

I use Moparscape and for some reason it calls itself hybridscape… i want to know how to remove NPCs and Set them. All they have on its options are “File, Console, MusicPlayer, Maplock, Aryan, and help” i want to know how to set a new spawn points for beginners, new NPCs and To make PvP areas. Canm somebody help me? i keep hearing stuff like-

345138
Member

Rep: 0
Offline

 How to make santa say Welcome to (your server name here)

« on: December 19, 2006, 06:52:39 AM » Quote

Purpose: To make santa say Welcome to(your server’s name right here)

Difficulty: 1/10 or 2/10

Assumed Knowledge: How to use autospawn and npchandler

Server Base: Pimpscape probaley all i only tested it on pimpscape so i dont know

Classes Modified: autospawn and npchandler

Procedure
Step 1: First open up autospawn and go right all the way to the bottem just before Endoflist make 2 spaces to put in a code!and put in

Code:
spawn = 1552 3252 3425 0 0 0 0 0 1 santa
spawn = 1552 3255 3425 0 0 0 0 0 1 santa[/i]

Step 2: Now open up npc handler and search for moo when ure there you should see
Code:

npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “Moo”;
}
}
[

Step 3: Well at the last } press enter and add

Code:
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to (your server name here)!”;
}
}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “Weclome to (your server name here)!”;
}
}
now just change the (your server name here)to your server’s name!

Credits:me %95 or %100 if someone posted this before me im %95

Posted at: December 19, 2006, 06:44:51 AM

And also this is my first tutorial so please be nice
